reviewText: This tape is done in sections: standing poses, backbends, etc. Its done in a silent black background with voice over. The camera angle changes throughout the pose. The voice-over is Jason. The poses are described VERY WELL with a gotcha explained such as 'if your low back still feels compressed....drop your tailbone further or come out of the pose slightly.'' Very good. I will use this to take me from advanced beginner to intermediate levels, playing the tape once a week to refine my knowledge of how to do the poses correctly. Yoga should be safe!!
summary: For a Pose Encyclopedia_takes you to the next level
Title: N/A

reviewText: this is an amazing DVD.  I'm semi-new to yoga.  I have been practicing on and off for awhile, always intimidated by those that flow seamlessly.  But this DVD is amazing.  I like how you get full views of each pose - showing proper form.  It's a godsend.
summary: Learning the right form is most important
